org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.inventory

Class NBTCraftingGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.inventory.CraftingInventory
      • org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.inventory.NBTCraftingGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.inventory.IClearable, net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory, net.minecraft.inventory.IRecipeHelperPopulator

    public class NBTCraftingGrid
extends net.minecraft.inventory.CraftingInventory
    A simple implementation of a crafting grid that stores it's inventory in NBT.

        public NBTCraftingGrid(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                       int itemIndex,
                       net.minecraft.util.Hand hand,
                       net.minecraft.inventory.container.Container eventHandler)
        Make a new instance.
        Parameters:
        player - The player using the grid.
        itemIndex - The index of the item in the player inventory.
        eventHandler - The event handler if the grid changes.
        hand - The hand the player is using.
